verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shiggaion|strong="H7692"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*; save \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* pursuers,

\w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* shred \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w and|strong="H3068"\w* tear \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* pieces \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w rescue|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* God, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5337"\w* done this, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* injustice \w is|strong="H5315"\w* on \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hands,

\w if|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* rewarded \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ally \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H6213"\w*, \w if|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* plundered \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foe \w without|strong="H6213"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w*,

then may \w my|strong="H7999"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H1580"\w* \w and|strong="H7451"\w* overtake \w me|strong="H1580"\w*; may he trample \w me|strong="H1580"\w* \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* ground \w and|strong="H7451"\w* leave \w my|strong="H7999"\w* honor \w in|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* dust. Selah

Arise, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w Your|strong="H7291"\w* anger; rise \w up|strong="H7931"\w* against \w the|strong="H7291"\w* fury \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H7291"\w* enemies. Awake, \w my|strong="H7291"\w* God, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* ordain judgment.

Let \w the|strong="H5375"\w* assembled peoples gather around \w You|strong="H6680"\w*; \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* seat \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* judges \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*; vindicate \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness \w and|strong="H7725"\w* integrity.

\w Put|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* establish \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* searches hearts \w and|strong="H3068"\w* minds.

\w My|strong="H3559"\w* shield \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w with|strong="H6662"\w* God, \w who|strong="H6662"\w* saves \w the|strong="H3559"\w* upright \w in|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*.
God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* judge \w and|strong="H4043"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w who|strong="H3477"\w* feels indignation each day.

If \w one|strong="H3605"\w* does not repent, God \w will|strong="H6662"\w* sharpen \w His|strong="H3605"\w* sword; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* bent \w and|strong="H3117"\w* strung \w His|strong="H3605"\w* bow.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H2719"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w His|strong="H7725"\w* deadly \w weapons|strong="H2719"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* ordains \w His|strong="H7725"\w* \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w* \w with|strong="H7725"\w* fire.
Behold, \w the|strong="H3559"\w* wicked man travails \w with|strong="H3627"\w* evil; \w he|strong="H4194"\w* conceives trouble \w and|strong="H3627"\w* births falsehood.

\w He|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* dug \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hole \w and|strong="H5999"\w* hollowed \w it|strong="H2009"\w* out; \w he|strong="H2009"\w* \w has|strong="H2009"\w* fallen into \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w his|strong="H3205"\w* own making.

\w His|strong="H6466"\w* trouble recoils \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w himself|strong="H5307"\w*, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* violence \w falls|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* own \w head|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* thank \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness \w and|strong="H7725"\w* sing praise \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7218"\w*.
